The RSUs are subject to the requirements of (i) Section 954 of the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (regarding recovery of erroneously awarded compensation) and any implementing rules and regulations thereunder, (ii) similar rules under the laws of any other jurisdiction, (iii) the Compensation Recovery Policy of the Company or similar policy as in effect from time to time and (iv) any policies adopted by the Company to implement the foregoing requirements, all to the extent determined by the Company in its discretion to be applicable to you.
